Description: Ruins of the Villa of Maecenas, Tivoli; deep arches of a large building, with further arches and a high fence to right, foliage overhanging, two figures in the foreground and another to right Pen and brown ink, with grey-brown wash, over traces of black chalk
Bibliographic references: Hind 1915-31 / Catalogue of Dutch and Flemish Drawings preserved in the Department of Prints and Drawings in the British Museum (10)
Exhibition history: 1968 BM, Piranesi, no.10 2004-2005 Oct-Jan, Birmingham, Barber Inst of Fine Arts, 'Bartolomeus Breenbergh 'Joseph in Egypt'
